main event: A round yellow unidentified object was observed flying over Washington, D.C. on July 3, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as the size of a balloon and was seen flying like a silvery star,The object blinked twice on its outer edge,The sighting lasted for 2 minutes,The object flew in a northwest direction at 2135 hours,No sound or aerodynamic features were noticed during the observation.
witness description: Rev. William B. Gill, N.E. Washington
